title: WTB:  T206 Select Player Off Backs
author: JoeRand

posts.post_title: WTB:  T206 Select Player Off Backs
posts.post_content:
Looking for off backs (no Piedmont or Sweet Caps) of the below players.  Ideally raw or graded 1.5-3 condition.  Will pay strongly for them.  PM or email me at joe.rand@yahoo.  Thanks!

Bill Abstein
Doc Adkins
Whitney Alperman
Neil Ball - fielding
Beals Becker
Bob Byrne
Charles Chappie
Mike Donlin - fielding
Jerry Downs
Joe Lake - New York
George McBride
Fred Merkle - portrait
Chief Myers - batting
Barney Pelty - horizontal
Mike Powers
Ed Reulbach - glove
Wildfire Schulte - front view
